name: Monster Tower (itch) (Patrick)
description:
Made for the GM48 gamejam in 48 hours in October 2019.

https://gm48.net/game/1432/monster-tower

Monster Tower is an action adventure game about getting to the top of the tower. Fight your way through at least 2 different enemies!

Dash, slash, and slash some more through at least 2 different bosses!

A dynamic original soundtrack. At least 10 different sound effects.

Make your name at the top of the Monster Tower!
